pkgmetadata.longdescription: Desirable Dietary Pattern // The desirable Dietary Pattern (DDP)/ PPH score measures the variety of food consumption. The (weighted) score is calculated based on the type of food. This package is intended to calculate the DDP/ PPH score that is faster than traditional method via a manual calculation by BKP (2017) http://bkp.pertanian.go.id/storage/app/uploads/public/5b f/ca9/06b/5bfca906bc654274163456.pdf and is simpler than the nutrition survey http://www.nutrisurvey.de. The database to create weights and baseline values is the Indonesia national survey in 2017.
